from re import sub

def process(S):
    R = {'8':'ate','w8':'wait','gr8':'great','4':'for','b4':'before'}
    for r in R:
        S = sub(r'\b%s\b' % r, '%s' % R[r], S)
    return S

def main():
    T = int(raw_input())
    for t in xrange(T):
        S = raw_input()
        print process(S)

main()
